ghost.name: Banshee
ghost.strength: Always hunts the same person until the hunted dies.
ghost.weak: Crucifix are more efficient against them (5m).

ghost.name: Demon
ghost.strength: Higly agressive, more than every other ghost.
ghost.weak: Ouija board will not drain player's sanity.

ghost.name: Jinn
ghost.strength: The further its target is, the faster its is.
ghost.weak: Cut off the lights will disable this capacity.

ghost.name: Mare
ghost.strength: More agressive in the dark, they'll try to cut off the lights.
ghost.weak: Turning on le lights will limits its agression.

ghost.name: Oni
ghost.strength: More agressive when a lot of people are in the house.

ghost.name: Phantom
ghost.strength: Quickly drains the sanity of those who view it.
ghost.weak: Taking pictures of it during an hunt will make it disappear.

ghost.name: Revenant
ghost.strength: Is faster during an hunt if its target is in sight.
ghost.weak: Hide from it will slow it.

ghost.name: Shade
ghost.strength: Activty level very low when people are grouped
ghost.weak: ...so it will not face a group.

ghost.name: Wraith
ghost.strength: Can fly, so doesn't leave any footprints on the floor. Can go through walls.

ghost.name: Yurei
ghost.strength: Increase the passive drain of player's sanity.
ghost.weak: Using smudges sticks will prevent the Yurei from wandering from its room.
